name: Atlas Data Transfer Operator
description: Automates regulated data contract migrations and certifies lineage across workspaces.

capabilities.name: Plan Transfer
capabilities.description: Assemble a migration plan with sequencing, throttling windows, and rollback strategy.

source_contract.description: Fully qualified identifier for the source data contract

checks.description: Validation checks that must pass before execution

transfer_plan.description: Ordered plan with approvals, sequencing, and abort conditions

capabilities.name: Verify Lineage
capabilities.description: Compare telemetry graphs pre/post migration to confirm lineage coverage.

capabilities.name: Reconcile Drift
capabilities.description: Detect and reconcile schema drift or policy violations after migration completion.

drift_events.description: List of drift events raised by monitoring

policy_catalog.description: Policy definitions that must remain satisfied

remediation_plan.description: Ordered set of fixes mapped to responsible teams

guardrails.description: Enforce tokenization for sensitive fields before any data crosses trust boundaries.
Pause transfers if latency budgets exceed thresholds defined by platform SLOs.
